jobTitle: 2018 Summer Intern, Business Intelligence & Data Warehouse
jobDescription: POSITION OVERVIEW  This position will work in Data warehousing / Business Intelligence area. Responsible for tracking issue / incident list (from ServiceNow), categorizing them into proper workgroups, assigning them to responsible groups/ individuals. They will also learn following up the issues to its resolution by participating in the triage meetings, as well as triage issues using simple SQL. RESPONSIBILITIES § Read all the incidents reported under Hyperion and BI Workstream.  § Work with current SME to understand categorization and assignments. (May assign few issues to themselves )  § Follow up with assignees on triaging the issue.  § Document triage where possible.  § Work with OBIEE and Hyperion reporting modules  § Ability to work in a team environment with customer focus  § Performs other duties as assigned. QUALIFICATIONS § Education: Bachelor / Masters.  § Concentration: Computer Science preferable field of data management / analytics.  § Knowledge, Skills & abilities PL SQL, MS Office (Excel, Visio, Power point )
